sentence.Network_en: Building societies make loans to creditworthy customers.
sentence.Network_cn: 购房互助协会为信誉良好的客户提供贷款。

sentence.Network_en: In the long term this would make developing countries more creditworthy.
sentence.Network_cn: 从长期看,这将提高发展中国家的资信.

sentence.Network_en: A country defaulting on its foreign debts is scarcely creditworthy whatever its form of government.
sentence.Network_cn: 一个国家,不管有什么样的政府,只要对其外债实行赖帐,就没有什么信誉可言了.

entry.def: A creditworthy person or organization is one who can safely be lent money or allowed to have goods on credit, for example because in the past they have always paid back what they owe.

example.ex: Building societies make loans to creditworthy customers.
example.tran: 购房互助协会为信誉良好的客户提供贷款。

auth_sentence.content: You cannot make any nation that is unable to service its accumulated debts more creditworthy by extending more credit!
auth_sentence.res_content: You cannot make any nation that is unable to service its accumulated debts more creditworthy by extending more credit!
auth_sentence.res_content_con: You cannot make any nation that is unable to service its accumulated debts more creditworthy by extending more credit!

auth_sentence.content: For instance, some CDFIs will lend to less-creditworthy people if they enroll in financial-education courses.

auth_sentence.res_content_con: For instance, some CDFIs will lend to less-creditworthy people if they enroll in financial-education courses.

auth_sentence.content: The bankers say few creditworthy candidates are walking through their doors despite signs of economic recovery.
